_header: When that I had two hundred pounds
Subjects: money, use of; wealth, inconstancy of; wealth, dangers of
_description: Moral advice about the burdens of wealth — four couplets

CamTCC652.First Lines:
When þat I had ii c. li.I could not stand vppon þe
                    grovnd…
CamTCC652.Last Lines:
…and thys forsaken I from theme pasas poore a wreche as ever
                    was
CamTCC652.Note:
Added to right margin by a sixteenth-century hand, written as
                    prose.
